        public void prepareStep(double t0,
               double[] x0,
               double t1)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: FixedStepSolver
        Prepare a call to FixedStepSolver.integrateStep().
        Specified by:
        prepareStep in interface FixedStepSolver
        Parameters:
        t0 - defines the current timepoint for the integration
        x0 - defines the current state for the integration
        t1 - defines the end timepoint for the integration
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if FixedStepSolver.initialize(ch.ethz.bhepp.ode.Ode) has not been called before

      • integrateStep

        public double integrateStep(double t,
                   double[] x,
                   double t1,
                   double[] xOut)
        Description copied from interface: FixedStepSolver
        Integrate the ODE with a single step.
        Specified by:
        integrateStep in interface FixedStepSolver
        Parameters:
        t - current timepoint for the integration
        x - array holding the current state for the integration
        t1 - defines the end timepoint for the integration
        xOut - array to store the new state after the integration step
        Returns:
        the new timepoint after the integration step
